name: HOWARD UNION OF TEACHERS et al. v. STATE
name_abbreviation: Howard Union of Teachers v. State

parties: HOWARD UNION OF TEACHERS et al. v. STATE.

opinions.text:
ORDER
The petition for writ of certiorari is granted.
SHEA, J., did not participate.

attorneys: Abedon, Michaelson, Stanzler, Biener, Skolnik & Lipsey, Richard A. Skolnik, Providence, for petitioners.
John J. Turano, Labor Relations Administrator, Westerly, for respondent.
casebody.head_matter:
HOWARD UNION OF TEACHERS et al. v. STATE.
No. 82-195-M.P.
Supreme Court of Rhode Island.
June 17, 1982.
Abedon, Michaelson, Stanzler, Biener, Skolnik & Lipsey, Richard A. Skolnik, Providence, for petitioners.
John J. Turano, Labor Relations Administrator, Westerly, for respondent.
